title: New Champ Select Chroma Problem
body: Just wanted to bring attention that the Chroma Packs do not work in the New Champ Select.  Or at least they didn't when I Locked in the Chroma on Vayne's Dragon Slayer about an hour ago.  There was no way to choose the color I wanted.  Hopefully it will get fixed, seeing as though Riot disabled the new Select already to work out kinks.  I know a new system may have a few issues so I hope it all turns out well because I did like the idea with that new champ select.{{champion:67}}

replies.body:
Hey EsKiM0,

This is a known issue and we're working to resolve it! ^-^
A friend of mine was playing with a skin he didn't even own nor could he buy right now as it's legacy.. so yeah I'd say the system has a couple skin issues in it.
chroma's can't be selected in the new champ select, it's a known issue
